languages.text: "Теперь прикончить нас — вопрос престижа. Мы — призовая дичь".
"They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."
languages.original_text: "Теперь прикончить нас — вопрос престижа. Мы — призовая дичь".

traits.locale_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果他们打算挽回面子，就必须杀了我们。在他们眼中，我们成了最有价值的猎物。”
languages.original_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."

traits.locale_text: “如果他们打算挽回面子，就必须杀了我们。在他们眼中，我们成了最有价值的猎物。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « S'ils veulent sauver la face, ils n'ont pas d'autre choix que de nous tuer. Nous faisons une proie de choix, maintenant. »
languages.original_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."

traits.locale_text: « S'ils veulent sauver la face, ils n'ont pas d'autre choix que de nous tuer. Nous faisons une proie de choix, maintenant. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Tienen que matarnos para preservar su imagen. Ahora somos presas muy valiosas».
languages.original_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."

traits.locale_text: «Tienen que matarnos para preservar su imagen. Ahora somos presas muy valiosas».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「面目を保ちたいなら、俺らを殺さなくてはならない。今は俺たちが奴らのゲームの商品ということだ」
languages.original_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."

traits.locale_text: 「面目を保ちたいなら、俺らを殺さなくてはならない。今は俺たちが奴らのゲームの商品ということだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn sie ihr Gesicht wahren wollen, müssen sie uns töten. Wir sind für sie jetzt die prestigeträchtigste Beute."
languages.original_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn sie ihr Gesicht wahren wollen, müssen sie uns töten. Wir sind für sie jetzt die prestigeträchtigste Beute."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."

languages.text: "Rezil olmak istemiyorlarsa bizi öldürmeleri gerek. Artık onlar için en büyük avız."
languages.original_text: "They have to kill us if they want to save face. We're prize game to them now."

traits.locale_text: "Rezil olmak istemiyorlarsa bizi öldürmeleri gerekiyor. Artık onlar için ödüllü bir oyun gibiyiz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
